title: Junior Business Executive
hiringOrganization: Euro Strategic Events Pakistan Pvt Ltd
content:
Job Description

Looking to hire enthusiastic & result oriented execs for an entry level position with attractive incentives & growth oppurtunities.

We believe in hiring high potential candidates and investing in their training & development. We provide oppurtunities & recognition for those that excel & operate in a dynamic & incentive based culture.

As a Business Executive you will proactively produce business for our market leading corporate programs.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:.

  • Creating, developing & maintaining excellent relationships with clients through a consultative sales approach and by clearly demonstrating the value of the strategic information.
  • Keep abreast of market developments and identifying and researching new growth areas of sales.
  • Planning the day, cold calling, KPI's, Extensive pitching for the productivity.
  • Indepth and extremely relevant market research and analysis.
  • Generating quality leads, Identify target market sector and audience.
  • Closing business to reach revenue targets.

The Ideal Candidates should have:

  • A graduate with good business acumen and the ability to digest complex market knowledge fats.
  • A desire to build a career in sales.
  • Driven and purposeful, hardworking and ambitious, Intelligent, sharp and logical.
  • Professional eager and open to learn our own unique sales process.
  • Strong Verbal and written communication skills

Skills

Microsoft Office Suite, Online Searching, Communication Skills

title: Carpenter
content:
Job Description

1. Inspect Campus buildings and facilities for needed services and repairs of furniture

2. Repair cabinets, doors, frameworks, and other wooden fixtures used in buildings, using woodworking machines, carpenter's hand tools, and power tools.

3. Remove damaged or defective parts or sections of structures and repair or replace.

4. Build furniture as per provided sample / design

5. Operate and maintain carpentry tools and equipment

6. Prepare a preventive maintenance schedule 

7. Cut timber /Formica Sheet to the right size and shape and trim parts of joints to ensure a snug fit.

8. Match materials for color, grain, and texture, giving attention to knots and other features of the wood.

9. USE Masonite, Formica, and vinyl surfacing materials for build new furniture.

10. Estimate the amounts, types, and costs of needed materials.

11. Finish surfaces of woodwork or wallboard in campus, using paint, hand tools, and paneling.

12. To maintain proper inventory of wooden items which are received and installed as and when required.

 

Skills

Problem Solving and Technical Skills

title: Accountant
content:
Job Description

We are looking for a qualified Accountant to handle prepare, compute, manage, research and analyze all accounting data, in order to provide quantitative information on performance, financial position, solvency, liquidity and cash flows of our business.

Responsibilities

  • Manage all accounting operations based on accounting principles
  • Prepare budget and financial forecasts
  • Publish financial statements in time
  • Conduct month-end and year-end close process
  • Collect, analyze and summarize account information
  • Compute taxes and prepare tax returns, balance sheet, profit/loss statement etc
  • Develop periodic reports for management
  • Audit financial transactions and document accounting control procedures
  • Keep information confidential and secure them with random database backups
  • Keep up with financial policies, regulation and legislation

Requirements

  • Proven working experience as a cost accountant or in a relevant field
  • Thorough knowledge of accounting and corporate finance principles and procedures
  • Excellent accounting software user
  • Strong attention to detail and confidentiality
  • Advanced degree in Accounting

 

Skills

MS Office, ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE ERP

title: WASH Officer
content:
Job Description

 

  • Carry out (participate) in baseline assessments for water supply, sanitations & Construction.
  • Help and plan Water supply & Construction related activities.
  • Prepaid the bill of quantity and design for water facilities (Hand pump) related activities.
  •  Supervise and monitor day-to day activities in collaboration with the Engineers.
  •  Prepare regular reports on water quality, quantity and construction related data bases for monitoring.
  •  Prepare technical drawings, BOQs and cost estimation for Water and sanitations schemes.
  • Coordinate with other WASH field staff (to ensure that the various aspects of the WASH Program are integrated.
  •  Forecast and manage the delivery of the equipment’s and materials needed on the site in close collaboration with logistic department.
  • Ensuring all the contractor work in accordance to the work plan and technical specifications.
  •  Ensure safety procedures and rules are respected in the field by all workers.
  •  Represent Organization with different stakeholders at field level.
  • Maintain good communication with beneficiaries and partner organizations on the field
  •  Perform other work - related duties and responsibilities as may be assigned by the Supervisor.
  •  Participate in additional activities in line with Organization needs, including needs               assessments, emergency response, etc.
  •  Plan and organized the operation and maintenance training for community related   water      and sanitations facilities provided by Organization.
  • Ensure the proper use of WASH facilities/ transfer the technical knowledge for appropriate    use of facilities.
  • Communicate activity objectives among the team and insure deadlines are met
  •  Organize and lead regular planning and output meetings with staff.
  • Track team attendance, monitor and evaluate performance, and provide relevant capacity building support.

 

Job Details

title: Office Coordinator
content:
Job Description

We are looking for a skilled Office Coordinator to undertake a variety of day-to-day office and clerical tasks. You will be an integral part in ensuring that our office operations run smoothly and are successful in supporting other business activities.

An excellent office coordinator is, above all, an organized and competent professional with phenomenal communication skills. You will be comfortable dealing with people and able to carry out administrative duties with accuracy and speed.

The goal is to ensure that office operations are efficient and add maximum value to the organization.

Responsibilities

  • Follow office workflow procedures to ensure maximum efficiency
  • Maintain files and records with effective filing systems
  • Support other teams with various administrative tasks (redirecting calls, disseminating correspondence, scheduling meetings etc.)
  • Greet and assist visitors when they arrive at the office
  • Monitor office expenditures and handle all office contracts (rent, service etc.)
  • Perform basic bookkeeping activities and update the accounting system
  • Deal with customer complaints or issues
  • Monitor office supplies inventory and place orders
  • Assist in vendor relationship management

Requirements

  • Proven experience as office coordinator or in a similar role
  • Experience in customer service will be a plus
  • Knowledge of basic bookkeeping principles and office management systems and procedures
  • Outstanding knowledge of MS Office, “back-office” and accounting software
  • Working knowledge of office equipment (e.g. optical scanner)
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Organized with the ability to prioritize and multi-task
  • Reliable with patience and professionalism
  • Associate’s/College degree; BSc/Ba in business administration or relevant field is a plus

 

 

Skills

MS Office, Accounting Software

title: Telesales Representative
content:
Job Description

A well established international call Center at Lahore requires enthusiastic Telesales Representatives to work on U.K & US campaigns, offering attractive 5-6 digit package with job security and long  term career growth.

Responsibilities

  • Contact potential or existing customers to inform them about a product or service using scripts
  • Answer questions about products or the company
  • Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close sale
  • Enter and update customer information in the database
  • Go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales
  • Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information
